title: Arabica
subtitle: Oval-shaped, flat, dark and greasy
taste: Delicate, smooth, fruity and sweet, slightly acidic
details: To enjoy the delicate flavor, buy the whole roasted beans and grind them yourself

title: Robusta
subtitle: Circular-shaped, pale and dry
taste: Bitter, earthy, grainy, acidic, with nutty and chocolaty notes
details: Robusta can stand up to any amount of milk and sugar, ideal for making iced coffee

title: Liberica
subtitle: Large, asymmetrical, teardrop-shaped
taste: Bitter top notes with a hint of floral and spice, slightly smoky
details: Brew on its own to savor its earthy and aromatic flavor. Ideal for making espresso

title: Excelsa
subtitle: Teardrop-shaped, small and round
taste: Sweet, fruity, tart quality but is strong and dark.
details: Brew on its own to savor its earthy and aromatic flavor. Ideal for making espresso
